short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set and receive reminders for prayer times.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension helps user to set preferred salat time reminder.
Those who have to keep the browser open for most of the hours of the day and work in computer, this extension can help them to maintain salat time.

Simple to use - set your preferred time for each salat and the extension will send you a notification for each salat timely.

Also easy to adjust the salat times since the time will change based on the day of the year.
